A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: failed to address the questions left from the last film with any satisfaction\, effects were alarmingly bad at times and introduced new force powers that made no sense - like the ability to survive the vacuum of space without a suit whilst unconscious. complete disregard for basic science ... like the fact there's no gravity in space\, meaning its not sci-fi - just pure fiction. the writing for the film is a joke (and since when did the big ships run on fuel?) sub plots were a joke and very lazy - heck they could even invent nifty space casino games and just used what youd see here on earth. somehow the ships shields cant be penetrated by a bigger ship if you're at a specific range...  disregarding the half dozen star destroyers who seem to think its cool to watch the main ship's weapons be ineffective against the smaller ship - when they could just go \, close the gap and destroy it\, but i guess that's inconvenient to the poorly written plot that lacked any real story. at least the phantom menace had a story - yeah it sucked but it wasn't as pointless as this film! the worst star wars film ever made.
